content: this pattern is for the snowflake bookmark finished size about 11 long or as you desire yarn light weight #3 cotton yarn i used patons grace cotton yarn skill level easy free version of this pattern is available on my website https //www goldenlucycrafts com/crochet-snowflake-bookmark/ by purchasing a pdf file you will receive the pattern in a print-friendly styled and advertisement-free pdf file format video tutorial https //youtu be/vtytejbxjq8 si=j1jljuztbhappkqn
